data.name: Lunch Tycoon
data.detailed_description:
It's lunchtime, and the orders are piling in!

Manage your restaurant by completing customer orders, stocking up on inventory, marketing your business, and cleaning up the dinning room. Lunch Tycoon is a management strategy game where you run all parts of your restaurant. Keep customers happy and you'll earn stars, but miss too many orders and - you'll business will slow to a crawl.

Features:
-Minimalistic Design
-Inventory Management: Keep inventory stocked, buy food when prices are low
-Serve Customers: Fill customer orders quickly
-Clean Dining Area: Clear tables to allow more customers + possible tips
-Your very own office: Run advertisements, and watch your money grow
-Star Rating: Happy customers will increase your star rating. More stars means more $

data.short_description: Lunch Tycoon is a management strategy game where you run all parts of your restaurant. Keep customers happy and you'll earn stars, but miss too many orders and - you'll business will slow to a crawl.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
